response: in order to protect your personal information regarding data privacy, you should avoid sharing sensitive data such as passwords, bank details or credit card numbers online. use strong and unique passwords for each account and enable two-factor authentication wherever possible. be cautious about the websites you visit and the links you click on. avoid giving out your real name, address and phone number to strangers on social media. also, limit the amount of personal information you share with others such as birth date or location.<|endoftext|>
